alice.tuprologx.spyframe

Class Tree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • alice.tuprologx.spyframe.Tree<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the structures out of which trees shall be made.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Tree<T>
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Representation of a tree with spacing. Every node is centered above its children nodes. To assure this the spacing can only be changed by remeasuring the whole tree.
    Author:
    franz.beslmeisl at googlemail.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setStructure

        public final void setStructure(T str)
        Sets a new structure to be displayed by this component.
        Parameters:

      • setViewParams

        public final void setViewParams(float xspace,
                                float yspace,
                                float border,
                                java.awt.Font f)
        Sets the horizontal spacing and remeasures the tree nodes. Changes will be made to the attributes @link{xspace}, @link{border} and eventually @link{font} and @link{textheight}.
        Parameters:
        xspace - the new horizontal space between two closest possible nodes.
        yspace - the new vertical space between two closest possible nodes.
        border - the new distance between text and border inside the nodes.
        f - the new font. If null is passed the font will not be changed.

      • remeasure

        public float remeasure()
        Remeasures the tree nodes.
        Returns:
        width of the whole tree of term nodes.

      • height

        public float height()
        The height of the whole tree touching the outer bounds of the component.
        Returns:
        the total height.

      • pose

        protected float pose(Node node,
                     float xpos,
                     int level)
        Measures recursively a subtree the root of which is this and centers the this above the children.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to be posed.
        xpos - rightmost position of the neigbor to the left.
        level - logical depth of this node in the whole tree. (Zero-based.)
        Returns:
        width of this subtree including one @link{xspacing} left of each node. Two cases are considered: The children are together wider than the node itself or they are not.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • paintTree

        protected void paintTree(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                         Node node)
        Displays recursively the subtree rooted at the specified node. The connections to the children go from the center of the root to the upper middle of the respective child node.
        Parameters:
        g2 - the graphics to draw on.
        node - root of the tree to be drawn.

      • paintNode

        public void paintNode(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                      Node node)
        Displays this node with colored border and text.
        Parameters:
        g2 - the graphics to draw on.
        node - to be painted.
